### Chinese remainder theorem

---

Same e different n.

```py
from sympy.ntheory.modular import crt
from gmpy2 import iroot
from Crypto.Util.number import long_to_bytes


def main():
    e = 5
    n1 = 
    c1 = 

    n2 = 
    c2 = 

    n3 = 
    c3 = 

    n4 = 
    c4 = 

    n5 = 
    c5 = 

    ns = [n1, n2, n3, n4, n5]
    cs = [c1, c2, c3, c4, c5]
    flag = iroot(crt(ns, cs)[0], e)[0]
    print(flag)
    print(long_to_bytes(flag))


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
```
